# Indigenous Languages Translation and Editing Services
## Summary

The Department of Indigenous Services Canada (ISC) invites domestic businesses to provide professional Indigenous languages translation and editing services. 

Through a competitive procurement process, three (3) Standing Offer Agreements (SOAs) will be awarded, each valid for two (2) years from the date of award, with the possibility to extend by one (1) year periods for up to three (3) total additional years. The total value of the contract is not specified.

### Key Highlights

* Financial Services, Government Procurement - SRV category
* Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - Avril 2023
* Competitive - Open bidding
* Bid deadline: February 16, 2023, 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* Issuing Authority: Indigenous Services Canada
* Reference Number: PW-23-01023335
* Documents:
	+ Pricing Schedule (Excel file)
	+ RFSO Document (PDF file)

### Requirements

The bidder must provide professional IPSL and editing services to Indigenous Services Canada for use across the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Evaluation Criteria

Only financial proposals from financially stable companies will be considered for evaluation. Importance will be given to responsiveness, professionalism, and client satisfaction.
